title: Part 5314 - Surveillance
content:
Part 5314 - Surveillance

State Regulations
§ 5314.1 - Surveillance plan of operation; approval; plan amendment
§ 5314.2 - Surveillance department establishment; independence; physical characteristics; employee restrictions; training
§ 5314.3 - Surveillance room access, required logs
§ 5314.4 - Required equipment; capabilities
§ 5314.5 - Required surveillance
§ 5314.6 - Required recording
§ 5314.7 - Surveillance records retention

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
